input.sentences: a visit to sleeping beauty 's castle !
from the balcony a grand view was had by all .
inside were ornate structures designed to look like trees .
there was a beautiful hallway full of stained glass pictures .
they all told the story of sleeping beauty .
output.sentences: Today we visited Sleeping Beauty's Castle.
It has a marvelous view of the Disney square below the balcony.
The inside is beautifully detailed too.
The stained glass windows tell the story of Sleeping Beauty which you follow along as you walk.
One of the most memorable windows depicts the prince kissing the princess to wake her up from her slumber.
